title: Calories in 20 Piece Chicken Nuggets
meta_description: Find calories in 20 piece chicken nuggets: about 940 total, with protein, fat, carbs, sodium details, and variations for baked or sauced options.
assumptions: Breaded, deep-fried chicken nuggets, standard fast-food style (~17g each), no added sauces or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, breading, cooking method, and ingredients; check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: 20 piece chicken nuggets provide ~940 kcal and ~80 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken nugget?
faqs.a: About 47 kcal per standard breaded, fried chicken nugget.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 20 piece chicken nuggets?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 g protein from the chicken and breading.

faqs.q: Are chicken nuggets high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 20 pieces have ~3600 mg sodium due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in chicken nuggets?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by ~15 kcal per nugget compared to deep-frying.

faqs.q: What varies the calories in chicken nuggets?
faqs.a: Brand, portion size, breading thickness, and cooking method (fried vs. baked) impact totals.
